name: Poke Truck
description:
Jump in the wagon of the modern food! Get in your truck and start making some of the best Poke Bowls in the whole town! The more stars you get, the more ingredients you will unlock, and even go to diferent locations as you climb up in the ladder of success!

Direction, Design and UI: Ana Santana Leon

Art and Programming: Luis Martínez Gutiérrez(me)
